Class Link

A convenience directive for applying styling to a link.

See demo

Example:

<a href="#" ibmLink>A link</a>

See the vanilla carbon docs for more detail.

../../iframe.html?id=link--basic

inline

@Input()
@HostBinding({"hostPropertyName":"class.bx--link--inline"})
inline: boolean = false
  • Defined in src/link/link.directive.ts:39

Set to true to show links inline in a sentence or paragraph.

tabindex

@HostBinding({"hostPropertyName":"attr.tabindex"})
tabindex: any
  • Defined in src/link/link.directive.ts:33

Automatically set to -1 when link is disabled.
